reference.bosch: Bosch is a multinational engineering and electronics company.
reference.body: The Body Shop is a global beauty brand and it has more than 3,000 stores in more than 60 countries.
reference.lapland: Lapland Hotels is the largest and the most diverse hotel chain in Lapland.
reference.ikea: IKEA is a multinational furniture store.
